Dear All,
I am currently doing a project by using ANJI.
I have got the training data, the stimuli size is 30 and target size 
is 3. No of rows in the training data is 1260.
How should I set the properties initially?

I have run several evolving with  different properties, but the score 
returned is about 0.3 all the time. Why? How to solve it?

What does the score itself means? Fitness score?

How to set in properties the input layer as a linear layer and hidden 
as tanh layer and output layer as sigmoid layer?

If let's say I run evolving for second time, does it continue from 
previous one, or just start everything from beginning?
If from beginning, how can I set it so that it can start from previous 
result of evolving?


Thanks


King regards,



Chivas
